name: Flappy Soot
description:
Flap through the pipes without hitting anything! How far can you go?

Made using Haxe/Kha/Wyngine framework. I made this after the previous games:

  • https://wyleong.itch.io/pollen
  • https://wyleong.itch.io/hurdles
  • https://wyleong.itch.io/adventuroads

Art & Programming: Me

SFX: generated from bfxr.net
